alert.note: Alert for Northern Acadia; Northern Jefferson Davis; Upper Iberia; Upper Vermilion (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued December 02 at 3:33AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of south central and southwest Louisiana, including the following parishes, in south central Louisiana, Lafayette, Lower St. Martin, Upper Iberia, Upper St. Martin and Upper St. Mary. In southwest Louisiana, Northern Acadia, Northern Jefferson Davis, Southern Acadia, Southern Jefferson Davis and Upper Vermilion. * WHEN...Until 6 AM CST early this morning. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - 4 to 10 inches of rain has fallen over the past 24 hours with 1 to 2 more inches possible through 6 AM CST. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Northern Acadia; Northern Jefferson Davis; Upper Iberia; Upper Vermilion
